fr: 7ème Edition Culture du Monde -  Conférence guidée autour de l'expo Azulejos!

de:
Geführter Vortrag über die Ausstellung Azulejos! in der Mediathek um 14:30 Uhr

Die Cie Mâcadane kehrt dieses Jahr zurück, um Sie durch die farbenfrohen Straßen Portugals zu führen und Ihnen die bezaubernden Azulejo-Fassaden zu zeigen
Geführter Vortrag über die Ausstellung "Azulejos"!, die vom 20. September bis zum 05. November zu sehen ist.


Tarif: Kostenlos mit Reservierung für alle Altersgruppen

Online-Reservierung: https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet::t,FacetFilter:'{"_784": "Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'AGENDA des bib',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:DateStart_sort,SortOrder:1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Source!n,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Support:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:'',Support:'',UseCompact:!f)))
en:
Guided conference about the exhibition Azulejos! at the media library at 2:30 pm

The Mâcadane Company comes back this year to take you through the colorful streets of Portugal as if you were there, and make you discover their beautiful azulejos facades
Guided conference around the exhibition "Azulejos"! visible from September 20 to November 05.


Price: free on reservation for all publics

Online reservation : https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet:!t,FacetFilter:'{"_784": "Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'Bib AGENDA',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:DateStart_sort,SortOrder:1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Support:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:'',Support:'',UseCompact:!f))
it:
Conferenza guidata sulla mostra Azulejos! presso la mediateca alle 14.30

La Compagnia Mâcadane torna quest'anno per accompagnarvi in un viaggio attraverso le strade colorate del Portogallo e mostrarvi le loro splendide facciate di azulejos
Conferenza guidata intorno alla mostra "Azulejos"! visibile dal 20 settembre al 05 novembre.


Prezzo: gratuito su prenotazione per tutti gli spettatori

Prenotazione online : https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet:!t,FacetFilter:'{"_784": "Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'AGENDA dei pettorali',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:'DateStart_sort',SortOrder:'1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Ambito:'mediatheques',Dimensione:!n,Fonte:!n,Supporto:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Ambito:mediateche,Dimensione:!n,Fonte:'',Supporto:'',UseCompact:!f))
fr:
Conférence guidée autour de l'expo Azulejos!  à la médiathèque à 14h30 

La Cie Mâcadane revient cette année pour vous faire parcourir comme si vous y étiez, les rues colorées du Portugal et vous faire découvrir leurs ravissantes façades d'azulejos. 
Conférence guidée autour de l'exposition "Azulejos"! visible du 20 septembre au 05 novembre.


Tarif : gratuit sur réservation pour tous les publics 

Réservation en ligne : https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet:!t,FacetFilter:'{"_784":"Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'AGENDA des bib',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:DateStart_sort,SortOrder:1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Support:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:'',Support:'',UseCompact:!f)))
nl:
Rondleiding over de tentoonstelling Azulejos! in de mediatheek om 14.30 uur

De Mâcadane Company is dit jaar terug om u mee te nemen op een reis door de kleurrijke straten van Portugal en u de prachtige azulejos gevels te laten zien
Rondleiding door de tentoonstelling "Azulejos"! zichtbaar van 20 september tot 05 november.


Prijs: gratis op reservering voor alle doelgroepen

Online boeken : https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet:!t,FacetFilter:'{"_784": "Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'AGENDA of bibs',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:DateStart_sort,SortOrder:1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Support:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:'',Support:'',UseCompact:!f))
es:
Conferencia guiada sobre la exposición ¡Azulejos! en la mediateca a las 14.30 horas

La compañía Mâcadane vuelve este año para llevarle de viaje por las coloridas calles de Portugal y mostrarle sus hermosas fachadas de azulejos
Conferencia guiada en torno a la exposición "Azulejos", visible del 20 de septiembre al 5 de noviembre.


Precio: gratuito previa reserva para todos los públicos

Reserva en línea : https://mediatheques.ca2bm.fr/search.aspx#/Detail/(query:(Id:'10',Index:11,NBResults:31,PageRange:3,SearchQuery:(ExceptTotalFacet:!t,FacetFilter:'{"_784": "Médiathèque de Berck-sur-Mer"}',ForceSearch:!t,HiddenFacetFilter:{},InitialSearch:!f,InjectFields:!t,InjectOpenFind:!¡t,Page:0,PageRange:3,QueryGuid:cc3b7f40-5067-4ba5-a1e7-246f12a7a62b,QueryString:'*:*',ResultSize:10,ScenarioCode:'AGENDA of bibs',ScenarioDisplayMode:display-standard,SearchContext:14,SearchGridFieldsShownOnResultsDTO:!(),SearchLabel:'*:*',SearchTerms:'',SortField:DateStart_sort,SortOrder:1,TemplateParams:(Scenario:!n,Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:!n,Soporte:'',UseCompact:!f),UseCanvas:!t,UseSpellChecking:!n),TemplateParams:(Scenario:'',Scope:mediatheques,Size:!n,Source:'',Support:'',UseCompact:!f)
